Class Substitution

java.lang.Object
Substitution
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cipher
Direct Known Subclasses:
MonoAlphaSubstitution, Vigenere
public abstract class Substitution
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cipher
An abstract class that provides stubs for single character substitution and uses those stubs to provide string encryption.

    Constructors

    Substitution()

    abstract char decrypt​(char c)
    An abstract method for decrypting a single character.

    A method that uses decrypt(char c) to decrypt a whole string.
    abstract char encrypt​(char c)
    An abstract method for encrypting a single character.
    java.lang.String encrypt​(java.lang.String plaintext)
    A method that uses encrypt(char c) to encrypt a whole string.

      Parameters:

      A method that uses decrypt(char c) to decrypt a whole string.
      Specified by:
      decrypt in interface Cipher
      Parameters:
      cryptotext - The string to be converted back to plain-text.
      Returns:
